testcase.name: User can select options from dropdown menu
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the dropdown page..........................................passed When user clicks the menu and selects "Option 1"............................passed Then Option 1 is selected "Option 1"........................................passed

Given user is on the dropdown page..........................................passed When user clicks the menu and selects "Option 2"............................passed Then Option 2 is selected "Option 2"........................................passed

testcase.name: User can login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enters username "tomsmith"........................................passed And User enters password "SuperSecretPassword!".............................passed And User clicks login button................................................passed Then User is logged in......................................................passed

testcase.name: User cannot login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enters username "some username"...................................passed And User enters password "some wrong password"..............................passed And User clicks login button................................................passed Then User is not logged in..................................................passed

testcase.name: User tries different invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User tries to login with invalid credentials...........................passed Then User is not logged in..................................................passed
